item.title: About Pointer Tagging
item.description: From the 100s or 200s of suspended chrome tabs, I opened one of the tabs to make some progress (Imma yuuge procrastinator). This was a LWN article of a talk on Memory use in CPython and MicroPython by Kavya Joshi at PyCon ‘17 (USA). You can find the video of the talk here. It’s a great talk. The talk contrasts two reference implementation of python: CPython MicroPython Even though both are implementation of python but they are quite opposite with respect to the memory usage.
